QuestData.Title: The Doctor and the Lich-Lord
QuestData.Description: There are two... that must... be killed.$B$BThe doctor and... the lich-lord... are above. Find them... destroy them... before....$B$B...it is too... late....
QuestData.LogDescription: Destroy Doctor Razorgrin and Lich-Lord Chillwinter. Then, return to Sage Highmesa just to the south of The Dens of Dying.
QuestData.RewardText: Bristlehorn is dead?!$B$BI should never have let him go there by himself.
